credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
dimensions: 28.9 x 18.7 cm (11 3/8 x 7 3/8 inches), irregular sheet
title: Design for a Pencil Holder
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
description: Cylindrical holder drawn in plan and elevation.  The upper lip decorated with a ring of studs inciated in yellow color pencil to be executed in vermeil.  Underdrawing in graphite of pencil holder in golden section.
name: Drawing
